Description: A story about the Jazz Age
Review: A timeless classic about the American Dream.

Description: A teenager's experiences in New York City

Author: Harper Lee
Description: A novel about racial injustice
Review: Powerful story of morality and justice.

Author: George Orwell
Description: A chilling depiction of a totalitarian regime
Review: A thought-provoking dystopian novel.

Author: Jane Austen
Description: A classic novel about love and society

Title: The Road

Description: A story about a father and son's journey
Review: A gripping and emotional journey.

Description: A journey of self-discovery
Review: Inspirational story about following your dreams.

Title: Wuthering Heights

Review: Dark, intense, and unforgettable.

Title: Jane Eyre
Author: Charlotte Brontë

Title: The Picture of Dorian Gray

Title: Fahrenheit 451

Title: The Little Prince

Description: The tale of a young prince exploring different worlds

Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Author: J.K. Rowling
Description: A young wizard's journey begins

Title: The Shining

Description: A story of madness and supernatural events

Title: Dune

Title: The Bell Jar

Title: The Girl on the Train

Title: The Hunger Games

Title: The Secret Garden

Title: The Power of Now
